Title: The Gift (1)
Plot: The Blathereen, arch-rivals of the family Slitheen arrive on Earth. In a move that surprises the gang they declare peace between Earth and Raxicoricofallapatorius and they offer Sarah Jane a gift, one that might change the future of the human race forever.
GuestStars: Calvin Dean, Simon Callow, Miriam Margolyes, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jimmy Vee, Edward Judge, Sarah Paul, Nick Williams
